Literature.Title: Rational Avoidance of Protease Cleavage Sites and Symmetrical End-Tagging Significantly Enhances the Stability and Therapeutic Potential of Antimicrobial Peptides
Literature.Author: Zhu Y, Shao C, Li G, Lai Z, Tan P, Jian Q, Cheng B, Shan A

Sequence Information.Hemolytic Activity: Human erythrocytes:0% Hemolysis=128 µM,Human embryonic kidney HEK293T cells:10% Killing=128 µM
Sequence Information.Target Organism: Escherichia coli ATCC 25922(MIC=8µM),Escherichia coli UB1005(MIC=8µM),Salmonella enterica subsp. enterica serovar Typhimurium ATCC 14028(MIC=32µM),Salmonella enterica subsp. enterica serovar Typhimurium C77-31(MIC=32µM),Salmonella enterica subsp. enterica serovar Choleraesuis CVCC 503(MIC=32µM),Salmonella enterica subsp. enterica serovar Pullorum C79-13(MIC=32µM),Staphylococcus aureus ATCC 29213(MIC=>64µM),Staphylococcus aureus(MIC=>64µM),Staphylococcus aureus ATCC 43300(MIC=>64µM),Enterococcus faecalis ATCC 29212(MIC=>64µM),Staphylococcus epidermidis ATCC 12228(MIC=>64µM),Streptococcus agalactiae(MIC=64µM),Murine macrophage cells RAW 264.7(0-10% Killing=128µM)
